service.name: Carer Allowance
service.description: Carer Allowance (adult) is a fortnightly income supplement for people who provide additional daily care and attention for an adult with a disability or medical condition. Carer Allowance is not subject to income and asset tests, is not taxable and can be paid in addition to wages, Carer Payment or any other income support payment. To be eligible for Carer Allowance a carer must be providing additional care and attention on a daily basis, for an adult (16 years or over).
